text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/2b32700dabf392566d8e9fef76e0d587a891ee3e|patch 8.2.2222: Vim9: cannot keep script variables when reloading>
patch 8.2.2222: Vim9: cannot keep script variables when reloading

Problem:    Vim9: cannot keep script variables when reloading.
Solution:   Add the "noclear" argument to :vim9script.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2222: Vim9: cannot keep script variables when reloading · vim/vim@2b32700
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2222: Vim9: cannot keep script variables when reloading · vim/vim@2b32700
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: cannot keep script variables when reloading. Solution: Add the "noclear" argument to :vim9script.

patch 8.2.2221: if  is mapped on the command line 'wildchar' is inserted

Problem:    If  is mapped on the command line 'wildchar' is inserted.
Solution:   Set KeyTyped when using 'wildchar'. (closes #7552)

patch 8.2.2220: Vim9: memory leak when parsing nested parenthesis

Problem:    Vim9: memory leak when parsing nested parenthesis.
Solution:   Clear newargs.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2220: Vim9: memory leak when parsing nested parenthesis · vim/vim@e5730bd
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2220: Vim9: memory leak when parsing nested parenthesis · vim/vim@e5730bd
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: memory leak when parsing nested parenthesis. Solution: Clear newargs.

patch 8.2.2219: Vim9: method call with expression not supported

Problem:    Vim9: method call with expression not supported.
Solution:   Implement expr->(expr)().

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2219: Vim9: method call with expression not supported · vim/vim@7e36820
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2219: Vim9: method call with expression not supported · vim/vim@7e36820
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: method call with expression not supported. Solution: Implement expr->(expr)().

patch 8.2.2218: Vim9: failure if passing more args to lambda than expected

Problem:    Vim9: failure if passing more arguments to a lambda than expected.
Solution:   Only put expected arguments on the stack. (closes #7548)

patch 8.2.2213: checking white space around -> is not backwards compatible

Problem:    Checking white space around -> is not backwards compatible.
Solution:   Only check white space around =>.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2213: checking white space around -> is not backwards compa… · vim/vim@7cfcd0c
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2213: checking white space around -> is not backwards compa… · vim/vim@7cfcd0c
attachments.text: …tible Problem: Checking white space around -> is not backwards compatible. Solution: Only check white space around =>.
